website_summaries.verdict: Praised for its accessible drainage bin, spacious capacity & solid functionality.
pros: Drainage drawer is easy to access
Several presets for different laundry types
Child safety lock prevents setting changes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Astonishingly good tumble drier that senses when your washing is dry and stops when it's done. What a good saving on the electric. I will be buying these type from now on. Big drum, not too noisy, good water collector at the top of the machine, and much better fluff collector than I've ever seen before. Can't fault it. It arrived so fast I was astonished.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this Dryer
customer_reviews.text: Execellent tumble dryer everything about it is easy, I love the water tray at the top so easy to empty
customer_reviews.author: jjenna

customer_reviews.title: 2.5 out of 5
customer_reviews.text: Quite complex usability; the programmes set don't seem to be "normal" options and the dedicated minute options eg. 10, 30 and 60-minute programmes don't actually last the selected time. If you don't get to the machine when it finishes, it will continue on a 10-minute refresh cycle which is annoying and stresses me out as it goes all night which isn't good for electricity and surely it could also overheat. It does dry the clothes well once you work the programmes out.
customer_reviews.author: dirtyharris

customer_reviews.title: love this dryer
customer_reviews.text: Had this dryer for a week now and love it, especially the light when you open the door what a fantastic idea something I never knew was missing in my life! It's so easy to use looks nice and cheap as chips very pleased with this purchase so far, plus the company were fantastic, I did worry a little when I called to rearrange the delivery date at the last minute due to a hospital appointment as there was a voice message saying I must email the seller to arrange a suitable time but couldn't speak to anyone, but I worried over nothing as the swiftly got back to me and rearrange for me.
customer_reviews.author: marie deakin

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic value for money no steam or pipes built in draw for water an drys great 👍 love it much recommend
customer_reviews.author: Deano

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: "Which" recommended buy. Yes a bit noisy but no problem. Dries very well to settings and a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great service and goods.
customer_reviews.text: Love my new dryer. Easy to clean the filter and empty the water tank. Really cut the ironing pile in half. Great service from AO very nice delivery boys. All round a good experience of appliance purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Reviewer 18

customer_reviews.title: A quiet and efficient drier.
customer_reviews.text: A great drier both quick and efficient and very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tumbler dryer. Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Love this condenser dryer. Have always used vented before.. Not ever again. This tumble dryer is so easy to use. The drainage drawer is on the front at the top, making it super easy to remove. Great choice of different timers, love the fact, when timer is finished the dryer periodically keeps rotating, so clothes don't crease. And I love the fact there is a light inside the dryer, (only operating when the door is open) making it so much easier to see what's inside. Would absolutely recommend. very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: deb welli

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product for the money excellent extremely advanced for the price against other makes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 1 week.
customer_reviews.text: Broke within a week. Control screen dead. Contacted amazon and they promised a response within 24 hours. Two days later....still no response. Dreadful !
customer_reviews.author: Panzoom

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I love this tumble dryer. The water collection drawer is at the top and so you don't have to constantly bend down. I have had numerous dryers in the past but have to say this is one of the best.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Great machine, easy to use, wish I had got a condenser dryer much sooner. Good price looks great with my other stainless steel appliances.
customer_reviews.author: JULIE WILSON

customer_reviews.title: A much needed update.
customer_reviews.text: The last dishwasher I had was 20 years old, at least. It was outdated, took mutiple attempts to get my sheets dry and it was a heavy weight in my electricity wallet. Buying this one was a much needed improvement. It dries in one attempt (saving money for electrical use) and it saves money due to better techonology. Delivery was included and they even gave me a website telling me how far away my arrival was (and how many visits the deliverly drivers had left). A much needed update to our household.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Pagett

customer_reviews.title: Gets very hot will spoil clothes if not careful
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit noisy and has srank all my teashirts and sweatshirts. Have to keep an eye on it when in use . I just put the washing in on the 30 minute setting then check it then put it in for another 10 mins.then I have to hang them on the clothes airer to dry . Gets very hot so I can't leave clothes in and go out as it will ruin them.
customer_reviews.author: moomin

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Dryer
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good dryer with a reasonable price. Two things that annoy me about this: 1. Its sensors are not very stable since they decide to stop and thinks that the clothes inside are dried enough and 5 minutes later it starts to working again and this repeats for maybe 5 times. 2. It is not the easiest dryer to clean I ever use (this is my 4th dryer). I don't mean that the parts are not easy to remove and clean - the problem is that the parts are not collecting everything inside it so after cleaning the parts, I need to clean inside of the dryer too.
customer_reviews.author: Melih

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with my tumbler dryer it is easy to use and my washing comes out with no creasing.No problems with delivery and it look's good.
customer_reviews.author: DENNIS SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Super duper
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. The only complaint is that it takes about 1h and a half to dry the entire 6 kg laundry charge and we still haven t seen the energy bill to see if it consumes a lot of power.. appart from that, it is incredibly useful, especially in the UK weather or if you live in a place with no balcony or garden. After about 1 h the water tray needs to be removed and emptied, but that is really easy to do and it has a beeping sound to let you know when it is full.
customer_reviews.author: iulia

customer_reviews.title: It is brilliant at collecting the dust and hair from the washing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when my other much more expensive dryer packed up so as I needed a new one I picked a cheape one. I was very surprised just how good it really is. Its much faster at drying and the dust filter is really good. I have both dogs and cats and it really gets the hair and dust off of the washing. Even my daughter approved [she wanted me to buy a much more expensive one] in conclusion I would recommend this dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value tumble, does the job well
customer_reviews.text: I like the varied programmes on this tumble drier. You don't need to worry about setting a time as the programme you select does it for you. The cupboard dry option is good for towels and the iron dry option for shirts and things that need ironing. The eco programme is good too, it virtually dries everything and saves on power too, finishing a cycle quite quickly. The light inside is handy, enables you to see if anything is left behind.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Matching dryer to washing machine...
customer_reviews.text: My partner parents bought this one when theirs died, and I got to use it a lot as it was winter and we didn't have one. Shortly after that we moved into our new house and we needed one so we decided to go with what we knew was going to work. It is great and easy to assemble, to clean, to move, etc. I also bought the matching washing machine and the unit to stack them together. Best purchase ever. Really good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Good price, smart looking.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a height of under 85 and this was just under that. Works well, love the cupboard dry programme for both cotton and synthetics. Saves a lot of electricity on ironing. There's a quick ten or 30 minute programme, baby clothes and Jean programme. Quite quiet. Easy to clean, the water containers easy to pull out and the fluff collected is good. Switches off when clothing is dry.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bullen

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: It’s advertised as silver but it’s grey, doesn’t match my washing machine or fridge so not happy customer. My husband unpacked it and put it in kitchen while i was out or id be sending it back. It looks silver on photo
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Great machine with loads of room. I like the way it occasionally turns the washing after the programme has finished, meaning it prevents laundry from becoming creased. Water draw eady to remove & empty. Small issue with the door at the bottom not staying shut, but an engineer is coming out to rectify it. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: gaye murray

customer_reviews.title: Confusing warning symbols
customer_reviews.text: The tumble dryer does a decent job of drying laundry. The confusing part of this model is the symbols that flash warnings one of the lights that keeps flashing is the filter clean warning light. When the filter is extracted it is either clean or very little fluff gathered. The other concern is how hot the body of the dryer gets
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dryer. It has a large drum so you can fit the bedding and towels in. The back light when you open the door is really useful as our dryer is in outside storage. The settings are easy to use and the water tray at the top is much easier to empty than our previous one which emptied at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to use, I particularly liked the fact that it stops automatically when the wash is dry. The light inside is an added bonus that you wonder why every other dryer doesn't have. The AO delivery boys were fantastic, really friendly, polite and dropped it right into my kitchen area, and even refused to take a tip. How often do you get that kind of service these days. Excellent experience all round.
customer_reviews.author: martin cvetkovic

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: just love this dryer such a reasonable price and has so many features best thing is if put on cupboard dry washing perfectly dry and no creases! tried some of the other settings again love it, has a light inside and you can pause it if you wish the cycle to end earlier or check it then either continue or turn off, water container at the top so easy to empty (the other one was at the bottom and it was a struggle to get it out if limited on space) also filter easy to clean too, just like everything about it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Recommend This Product
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I purchased this BEKO Tumble Dryer 2 days ago and I think it's really good.It dries my clothes really quickly and its really easy to use if you follow the instructions.It's a good price for the product.
customer_reviews.author: noor

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much i bought two
customer_reviews.text: It works brilliantly. The light is a nice feature and it is easy to use. my parents dryer just died so i bought them one too. Don't know what else to say. It's an excellent appliance and works exactly as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Kevan Blakey

customer_reviews.title: Usefull
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend has used it couple of times already and she is really pleased with it saying its easy to use and really handy cuz you dont need to connect it to a drainage system only if you chose to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandru Neagu

customer_reviews.title: This tumble dryer is everything I hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.text: I am over the moon with my tumble dryer! It was deliverd a day early and was easy to unwrap packaging and get plugged in. It is efficient and has different sertings that meet all my needs, and is easy to clean. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! everything was alright,from the delivery to the installation,the dryer is very light and easy to install.I still have to try all the programmes, thought it would have been less noisy but is not that bad considering the good price!
customer_reviews.author: Romina

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine - upgraded since last purchase which makes it even better. Dries items to perfection!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Nice and quiet
customer_reviews.text: A great tumble dryer. I bought this for my daughter’s new flat and it fit perfectly under her breakfast bar section in their kitchen. Nice and quiet too
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great service. Good product.
customer_reviews.text: So far really good. Only installed it today but seems to work a treat. The delivery from AO.com first class. On time. The two delivery guys friendly and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: geoff-in-wales

customer_reviews.title: Takes a long time to dry clothes
customer_reviews.text: Good value and nice looking dryer but takes longer to dry the clothes than my old (30 years) machine did.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Everything you want and need in a tumble dryer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, use and has EVERY function you could want or need in a condenser tumble dryer. Heats very quickly and has enough settings to ensure your clothes will never shrink. I cannot recommend this dryer enough. If you are fed up with having to wait for your clothes to dry then this is a must buy. And most of all it is economical..... Buy without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: EDWARD BROOKS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect appliance but delivery service should be clearer
customer_reviews.text: The machine looks good in silver and matches my other appliances. It’s easy to use and has a large drum. It was helpful to have a range of dates to choose from for delivery The only thing that wasn’t good is that as I didn’t choose installation the appliance was delivered to outside the street door, the driver wouldn’t bring it in which I was surprised about. The delivery was to an elderly relative
customer_reviews.author: Mrs L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, easy to use, quiet, love the light that comes on when the drum is open, instructions easy to read and understand, so far, absolutely delighted !.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for what it does.
customer_reviews.text: Not always dry enough when it stops on the extra dry even, but over all very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Very good drier.
customer_reviews.text: It is fairly quiet. It has a big drum. There is a light in the drum. It has enough programs. It looks good. It has a sensor to stop when things dry. It is great the water going into a big dispenser in the top of the machine. I am buying another for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson Hunter

customer_reviews.title: First class.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very easy machine to use. It is very quite from model I used before. Plenty of programs to use and easy to empty. First class we recommended it so pleased I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Benham

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2. BEKO dryer and it does everything it is supposed to. I only use the sensor for drying and it does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: UEB

customer_reviews.title: Not just hot air
customer_reviews.text: What i liked about this product was it has saved me loads of time and what I use this product for is to dry my clothes after washing them because they get wet when you wash them.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is amazing wish I'd bought it years ago! Very easy to use, clothes are separated and ready to iron, would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Beryl

customer_reviews.title: good dryer and good price
customer_reviews.text: only used it once to try it out it worked great. but in the winter will use it a lot. and very good price
customer_reviews.author: richard millership

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD
customer_reviews.text: DRY'S very well saves a great deal of ironing , surprising the amount of water it extracts from clothes
customer_reviews.author: Wilf C

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value for money
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic value for money. Very efficient and looks great for the price. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: G. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great start
customer_reviews.text: Early days and still learning how to operate it but everything so far is better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: J M Brewster

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this dryer for the price, quiet when drying and really easy to understand and keep clean
customer_reviews.author: tangonanni

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with the dryer. Love the settings on it. Saving time and money
customer_reviews.author: J Priestley

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Think twice before buying this dryer as it blew the fuses in my house . I have requested a refund from AO and amazon and have been told I will have to wait 4/6 weeks while they investigate . I personally don’t want it in my house in case it goes on fire and burns my house down
customer_reviews.author: Agd

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase x
customer_reviews.text: 100% recommend this dryer so much better to empty water container than having to have a hose to outside x
customer_reviews.author: lynda foley

customer_reviews.title: Good machine with useful.l8ght inside the drum.
customer_reviews.text: This tumblendryer is wonderful. So much better than my last one and I love the lights 8nside which are so useful.
customer_reviews.author: Mellonclan

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get easier than this
customer_reviews.text: Very happy, the water collector is at the top, this makes it much easier to empty without spilling. Looks nice and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: S. B.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Great delivery Easy to use Should have bought a condenser years ago so much easier than a vented
customer_reviews.author: caz

customer_reviews.title: Delighted
customer_reviews.text: Delighted. Came slightly earlier which was a bonus. Nice and quiet easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had bought this ages ago. Very efficient and the water reservoir and fluff dispenser easily accessible. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Cagney

customer_reviews.title: Good price and does  good job
customer_reviews.text: Dries well and quickly. Bit noisier than my last one but does the job efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Bower

customer_reviews.title: Easy use
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as stated. Easy to install and easy dial on front to navigate. A little more noisey than my last tumble dryer but dries well and I feel it is good value
customer_reviews.author: mrs kim wood

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this dryer for a few weeks now and am really pleased It is so easy to use. There is no timer as there are built in sensors taking all the guess work out of the drying. The best bonus of all is that 95% of the clothes don't need ironing and are lovely and soft ready to be put away. Great dryer and not expensive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No condensation Jin the room from this dryer
customer_reviews.text: Great dryer at a good price this is my 2nd one as we are a family of five it is on daily
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: No more wet washing hanging around.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the tumble dryer for an elderly gentleman, he is over the moon with it.
customer_reviews.author: mary neville

customer_reviews.title: Diligent and cost effective
customer_reviews.text: I've had this drier for a couple of years: still very pleased, no problems, very fuel efficient and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Ericsson

customer_reviews.title: good size
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on behalf of a friend who was very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Carol Anne Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Loved my dryer and didn't seem to take to long in drying and saved on ironing when in mode cupboard dry
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Had for a few weeks now - excellent value ,easy use and does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: GRANT NEVEN

customer_reviews.title: Very good all round dryer
customer_reviews.text: It takes creases out of all your clothes and other items
customer_reviews.author: valerie atkins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent budget tumbler, wont buy expensive again
customer_reviews.text: Bought a more expensive tumbler a while ago and compared to this tumbler it was rubbish. This one day's your washing to a T. No need to put a timer on, just put on cupboard dry setting and it's done in no time. Excellent tumbler.
customer_reviews.author: kath

customer_reviews.title: I recommend to everyone
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can put it wherever I want and it makes it easier to retard water. I recommend to everyone

customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and use and we are pleased with the results of the drying

customer_reviews.title: Takes a large load
customer_reviews.text: Love this dryer works as it says. No moisture to worry about easy to empty water.

customer_reviews.title: does the job well
customer_reviews.text: dryer has been in use for some months now and does what is says on the box. easy clean filter but dont forget the condenser unit!

customer_reviews.title: Good product review.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, easy to use, easy to clean, good product, at the moment will recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great dryer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this dryer based on reviews, it's an excellent dryer, and really good value.

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy to use. A choice of settings for all your needs and easy to maintain.

customer_reviews.title: Broke under a year, not heating up
customer_reviews.text: Not even had this drier a year and it broke. Only use it a couple of times a week. I cleaned it after every use. Now there is no heat so the clothes do not dry. Very disappointing will not buy a product from this brand again, I've had a lot cheaper driers that last a lot longer in the past
customer_reviews.author: sherril

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my son and his girlfriend. They say it has changed their lives. Reliable and effective.

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST I HAVE HAD
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tumble dryer. We are very happy with it

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this dryer, easy simple and silent!! And a real bargain

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer
customer_reviews.text: This tumble dryer is awesome, easy to use, great price, fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: sharon mulgrew

customer_reviews.title: Good machine
customer_reviews.text: I like the appliance very much and is more efficient than my old one. Delivered on time. Only comments: no offer to take away old machine which is a lagal requirement or to take away packaging. Would have made a more positive customer experience.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works well, tells you when the water and filter need emptying.

customer_reviews.title: Quite happy - does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. Its a bit noisy but maybe I don't know how noisy they are meant to be. Does the job.

customer_reviews.text: This tumble dryer is more quieter then others I've had before also very easy to use thanks again.

customer_reviews.text: Took a while for me to get to grips with programme, but now I have ism really pleased with it! Quiet motor which is good and automatically knows when washing us dry!

customer_reviews.text: A little bit loud but works and does the job well. Good service from A&O as well. I've purchased all my electrical appliances from them.
